titles.title: Securing Our Propane Supply Act
Securing Our Propane Supply Act
A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to conduct a study to determine the feasibility and effectiveness of establishing a national strategic propane reserve.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Securing Our Propane Supply Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy (DOE) to study the feasibility and effectiveness of establishing a national strategic propane reserve that is separate from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve. If DOE finds a reserve should be established, then DOE must develop an implementation plan.
